live_updates: Technicians have identified the source of the issue but are unable to proceed with work due to safety concerns in the area. Work will continue in the morning, and we thank you for your continued patience.
Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
55028.summary: Some customers in Pouce Coupe are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
55028.title: Nov 10 - Pouce Coupe | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
